posts.summary: Are you guys plagued with self-doubt as well? It’s a terrible thing that society has taught us. “You’re not good enough, this...
posts.text: Are you guys plagued with self-doubt as well? It’s a terrible thing that society has taught us. “You’re not good enough, this isn’t good enough, no one will like this.” It stifles creativity like nothing else will. I admire people who are able to break out of this, especially if they are not what society considers successful.
posts.source:
Sereno Sky, author of the hippie novel “Lonely Traveller”
(via hippieseurope)

reblog.comment:
Sereno Sky, author of the hippie novel “Lonely Traveller”
(via hippieseurope)

posts.summary: Favela Jiu Jitsu: The Heart of a Champion | FIGHTLAND
posts.title: Favela Jiu Jitsu: The Heart of a Champion | FIGHTLAND
posts.excerpt: The latest dispatch from Fernando Terere's jiu jitsu nonprofit features Moleza, a 14-year-old orange belt known for pulling half guard and throwing wild flying triangles.
posts.description: […] he snatched up the other kids sleeve, threw his leg in the air, and executed an imperfect, albeit, relatively effective flying triangle, one of his new favorite moves. The other kid was not in the least bit happy about the wild attack and responded in an equally wild fashion. […]

reblog.comment: […] he snatched up the other kids sleeve, threw his leg in the air, and executed an imperfect, albeit, relatively effective flying triangle, one of his new favorite moves. The other kid was not in the least bit happy about the wild attack and responded in an equally wild fashion. […]

posts.summary: Set wallpaper in i3 window manager with feh
posts.title: Set wallpaper in i3 window manager with feh
posts.body:
Just started configuring i3 as my window manager for my Arch Linux installation. Setting a wallpaper can be handled with feh.

sudo pacman -S feh

Then add the following line to you i3 config (presumably at ~/.config/i3/config):

exec --no-startup-id feh --bg-scale /path/to/wallpaper.png

Found this at https://www.linux.com/learn/tutorials/766143-how-to-use-the-superfast-i3-tiling-window-manager-on-linux/

posts.summary: We are earth people on a spiritual journey to the stars. Our quest, our earth walk, is to look within, to know who we are, to...
posts.text: We are earth people on a spiritual journey to the stars. Our quest, our earth walk, is to look within, to know who we are, to see that we are connected to all things, that there is no separation, only in the mind.

posts.title: Speedhack
posts.body: Once upon a time I reported another player in Durotar for speedhacking when I just started out playing WoW. Some days later, I too tried playing a rogue with sprint. Some years later, I grew up.

reblog.comment: Once upon a time I reported another player in Durotar for speedhacking when I just started out playing WoW. Some days later, I too tried playing a rogue with sprint. Some years later, I grew up.
